title: Golden State Warriors logo font
content:
Could someone give me a hint what font is it ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141227075941im_/http:/typophile.com/files/warriors_4703.png)
author: bosfor

comments.content:
Yes, I see, but what should start off with to get a similar base? pls :)

I've googled out that Latin Condensed is a good idea but it's a commercial font, has anyone idea of a similar but free font ?

Manfred Klein has a free Latin called [Mk Latino](http://web.archive.org/web/20141227075941/http:/www.dafont.com/mklatinoplain.font?nb_ppp=50&text=WARRIORS).

- Mike Yanega
